Experiment: CMake support for iOS (#4709)

* Initial experiments building for iOS with CMake
* Add Info.plist template
* Build network extension for iOS
* Add Adjust support with -DBUILD_ADJUST_SDK_TOKEN=<token>
* Add some notes to the README.md
* Remove duplicate wireguard-go-version.h
* Fix cmake dependencies for glean
* Use find_program to locate golang build tool.
* Fix ios app entitlements
* XCode: disable auto-generation of build schemes for every target
* Add bundling of .xcasset catalog
* Revisit codesigning for non-Xcode generators.
* Ensure we use a consistent python for config and build
* Fix cross-compilation bugs for golang libraries
* Add workaround for iOS simulator builds on M1/M2 macbooks.
* Fix bug in macos app entitlements
* Split gleansample.h generation to fix Xcode dependency bug.
* Update ci_post_clone.sh for Xcode cloud
* Fix dependency loop between vpnglean and mozillavpn targets
* README: Correct capitalization of Xcode
* Fix vpnglean builds for iOS on M1 macs
* vpnglean: Force linking with /usr/bin/cc when building in Xcode
* qmake: Force python3 path for glean at config time
* Update README with instructions for simulation
* Fix missing vpnglean generated directory error

Co-authored-by: Owen Kirby <osk@Owens-MBP-2.lan>
Co-authored-by: brizental <beatriz.rizental@gmail.com>

notifications.

* ci: Add a task to send notification when release tasks finish

* Add new feature inAppProducts
* Split of purchases and products
* This paves the way for purchases on desktop.

Co-authored-by: Matt Cleinman <9295855+mcleinman@users.noreply.github.com>

Measure and display latency in server view. (#4234)

* Initial latency measurement task.
* Replace server-unavailable with latency score indicator
* Bump periodic task interval to 30s on staging
* Drive server latency data from Server model changes.
* Explicitly bind to INADDR_ANY when ping sender has a null address.
* Use IcmpSendEcho2 when sending pings without an explicit source.
* Add feature to enable/disable server latency
* Return a list of ServerCity objects from the CitiesRole
* Adjust connection score to prefer locations with more servers.
* Implement retries when measuring server latency
Disable autocorrect on sign up/in email input (#4856)
Force a timezone to be sure the date are processed correctly in functional tests (#4840)

Deprecate qmake for MacOS (#4821)

* Fix websocket unit test failure due to port conflicts
* Let's run tests using cmake on macos
* Experiment to run tests using cmake everywhere
* Fix unit and lottie in CI for macos
* Break out QML tests into their own ctest runs.
* Yolo cmake
* install cmake
* Fix cmake install
* Make sure everthing is in the right folder
* Remove some cruft and export build artifacts
* Remove qmake support for MacOS and prune unused files
* Remove qmake support for the dummy client
* Enable unit tests by default and update README.
* Fix missing translations in MacOS installer
* Disable cmake testing in linux packaging

Co-authored-by: Andrea Marchesini <amarchesini@mozilla.com>
Co-authored-by: Andrea Marchesini <baku@mozilla.com>
Co-authored-by: Sebastian Streich <streich.mobile@gmail.com>

Deprecate qmake for MacOS (#4821)

* Fix websocket unit test failure due to port conflicts
* Let's run tests using cmake on macos
* Experiment to run tests using cmake everywhere
* Fix unit and lottie in CI for macos
* Break out QML tests into their own ctest runs.
* Yolo cmake
* install cmake
* Fix cmake install
* Make sure everthing is in the right folder
* Remove some cruft and export build artifacts
* Remove qmake support for MacOS and prune unused files
* Remove qmake support for the dummy client
* Enable unit tests by default and update README.
* Fix missing translations in MacOS installer
* Disable cmake testing in linux packaging

Co-authored-by: Andrea Marchesini <amarchesini@mozilla.com>
Co-authored-by: Andrea Marchesini <baku@mozilla.com>
Co-authored-by: Sebastian Streich <streich.mobile@gmail.com>

Use the production balrog server (and a test channel) in testing mode (#4741)

Instead of using the staging balrog instance, always use the production
instance, so that staging is no longer on the critical path for
releases.

https://mozilla-hub.atlassian.net/browse/RELENG-797
